name: parameter-arity-variance-is-not-correct
description: A demonstration project showcasing TypeScript's parameter arity variance issues and comparing custom compiler behavior with the original Microsoft implementation. Currently supports Windows only.

scripts.transpile:all: npm run transpile:main && npm run transpile:13043 && npm run transpile:17868 && npm run transpile:20541 && npm run transpile:21868
